answers.answer: Call your Dr. Or GOOGLE BABYGIRL
Lean proteins and vegetables are best! Dont go crazy with starches and watch your milk, juice, and pop intake as well

question: Currently 18 years old with my first pregnancy. Last week I went to do my glucose tolerance test done and my results came out unexpected. I got the call today I have gestational diabetes. Can anyone give me a little more information about this? What are some foods that can help me control this? Or anything that can help?  Also, I am due in April .
title: Any help?
